name: Dolphin

trait.name: Charge
text: If the dolphin moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a slam attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Hold Breath
text: The dolphin can hold its breath for 20 minutes.

action.name: Slam
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

description:
Dolphins are clever, social marine mammals that feed on small fish and squid. An adult specimen is between 5 and 6 feet long.
Source: Volo's Guide to Monsters p. 208, Ghosts of Saltmarsh
